description: This file defines the NoteService class, which contains business logic for managing notes, including CRUD operations and conversion between Note entities and NoteResponse DTOs.

classes.name: NoteService
classes.description: Service layer handling business logic for notes, including CRUD operations and data transformation.

methods.name: findAll
methods.description: Retrieves all notes and converts them into NoteResponse DTOs.

methods.name: findById
methods.description: Finds a note by its ID, throws NotFoundException if not found.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new note from the provided request DTO.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by ID with data from request DTO.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note by ID if it exists, throws NotFoundException otherwise.

methods.name: toResponse
methods.description: Converts a Note entity into a NoteResponse DTO.
